fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: This dramedy tells the story of Forrest Gump, a man with low intelligence, who unexpectedly becomes a key figure in various significant events in U.S. history.

fields.title: Schindler'S List
fields.description: "Schindler's List" is a haunting portrayal of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of over a thousand Polish-Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

fields.title: The Hangover
fields.description: "Superbad" is a hilarious coming-of-age comedy about two high school friends on a quest to buy alcohol for a party, leading them on a wild and unpredictable adventure.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: "Inception" is a mind-bending thriller that delves into the world of shared dreaming, as a team of specialists attempts to implant an idea into a target's subconscious.

fields.title: Blade Runner
fields.description: "Blade Runner" is a dystopian sci-fi noir, set in a future where specialized detectives, known as Blade Runners, are tasked with hunting down rogue artificial beings.

fields.title: The Exorcist
fields.description: "The Exorcist" is a terrifying horror film about the possession of a young girl named Regan, and the attempts to rid her of the malevolent force within her.

fields.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
fields.description: "A Nightmare on Elm Street" is a classic horror film introducing Freddy Krueger, a vengeful spirit haunting the dreams of teenagers, leading to deadly consequences in reality.

fields.title: Die Hard
fields.description: "Die Hard" follows NYPD officer John McClane as he battles terrorists who have taken hostages in a Los Angeles skyscraper during a Christmas party.

fields.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
fields.description: "Mad Max: Fury Road" is a high-octane action film set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, where Max joins forces with Furiosa to escape the tyrannical Immortan Joe.

fields.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
fields.description: Renowned archaeologist Indiana Jones embarks on a quest to find the mythical Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis do, facing numerous challenges and adversaries along the way.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: the Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: Frodo Baggins and a diverse fellowship of companions set out on an epic journey to destroy the One Ring and prevent its malevolent power from falling into the wrong hands.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer'S Stone
fields.description: Young Harry Potter discovers his true identity as a wizard and embarks on his first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, uncovering mysteries and forging friendships.

fields.title: Pan'S Labyrinth
fields.description: Set against the backdrop of post-Civil War Spain, a young girl named Ofelia discovers a mythical labyrinth and encounters fantastical creatures, offering her a refuge from harsh reality.

fields.title: The Notebook
fields.description: "The Notebook" follows the enduring love story of Noah and Allie, whose passionate romance faces trials and tribulations, ultimately leaving an indelible mark on both their lives.

fields.title: Pride and Prejudice
fields.description: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel, "Pride and Prejudice" revolves around the spirited Elizabeth Bennet and the enigmatic Mr. Darcy, as their complex relationship unfolds amidst societal expectations.

fields.title: Saving Private Ryan
fields.description: During World War II, Captain Miller leads a group of soldiers on a perilous mission to locate and bring home Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in action.

fields.title: Full Metal Jacket
fields.description: Stanley Kubrick's "Full Metal Jacket" offers a stark portrayal of the Vietnam War, exploring the dehumanizing effects of combat on a group of U.S. Marines.

fields.title: Braveheart
fields.description: "Braveheart" is the epic tale of William Wallace, a Scottish rebel who leads a revolt against English oppression, becoming an iconic figure in Scotland's fight for freedom.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.description: Maximus, a Roman general betrayed by a power-hungry emperor, seeks vengeance as a gladiator in the brutal arenas of ancient Rome, ultimately challenging the empire's corruption.

fields.title: Toy Story
fields.description: "Toy Story" introduces a world where toys come to life when their owner isn't looking. Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and their toy companions embark on a quest to return home.

fields.title: Finding Nemo
fields.description: Marlin, a clownfish, embarks on a journey across the ocean to find his son Nemo, who has been captured by a scuba diver and placed in a fish tank.

fields.title: Seven
fields.description: Detectives Somerset and Mills investigate a series of gruesome murders inspired by the seven deadly sins, leading them into a harrowing game of cat-and-mouse with a sadistic killer.

fields.title: Silence of the Lambs
fields.description: FBI trainee Clarice Starling seeks the help of incarcerated cannibalistic serial killer Dr. Hannibal Lecter to catch another serial killer known as "Buffalo Bill."

fields.title: Sherlock Holmes
fields.description: The brilliant detective Sherlock Holmes and his loyal friend Dr. John Watson are pitted against the sinister Lord Blackwood, whose dark schemes threaten all of London.

fields.title: Gone Girl
fields.description: When his wife Amy goes missing, Nick Dunne becomes the prime suspect. As the media frenzy ensues, dark secrets and a web of deception unfold in this gripping psychological thriller.

fields.title: Back to the Future
fields.description: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past by a time-traveling DeLorean. He must ensure his parents' romance while finding a way back to the future.

fields.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
fields.description: A group of unlikely heroes, including Star-Lord, Rocket, Groot, Gamora, and Drax, join forces to save the galaxy from the threat of the powerful Infinity Stone.

fields.title: Double Indemnity
fields.description: Walter Neff, an insurance salesman, becomes entangled in a dangerous plot with the seductive Phyllis Dietrichson, leading to a web of deceit and murder.

fields.title: Chinatown
fields.description: Private detective J.J. Gittes is drawn into a complex web of corruption, deceit, and murder while investigating a case involving water rights in 1930s Los Angeles.

fields.title: Toy Story 3
fields.description: Return to the screens of the classic series, the same old characters, but in new adventures!
